answers.answer: Generally speaking no once the optic nerve is damaged that long it cannot be fixed. See an ophthalmologist at least every year to keep the good eye healthy and keep the diabetes under meticulous control.JCH MD

question: i had an accident my optical nerve was damage 10 years ago can i get my eye sight after 10 years because i am suffring from diabeties & verymuch scared the single eye its urgent pleasemanoj jadhav
